TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GestureDetector extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Detects various gestures and events using the supplied MotionEvents.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Android.Views.GestureDetector/IOnGestureListener listener) cil managed

Docs.param: the listener invoked for all the callbacks, this must not be null. If the listener implements the OnDoubleTapListener or OnContextClickListener then it will also be set as the listener for these callbacks (for example when using the SimpleOnGestureListener).
Docs.summary: Creates a GestureDetector with the supplied listener.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsLongpressEnabled { get; set; }
member this.IsLongpressEnabled : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Set whether longpress is enabled, if this is enabled when a user presses and holds down you get a longpress event and nothing further.
Docs.value: true if longpress is enabled, else false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnGenericMotionEvent(class Android.Views.MotionEvent ev) cil managed
abstract member OnGenericMotionEvent : Android.Views.MotionEvent -> bool override this.OnGenericMotionEvent : Android.Views.MotionEvent -> bool

Docs.summary: Analyzes the given generic motion event and if applicable triggers the appropriate callbacks on the OnGestureListener supplied.
Docs.returns: true if the OnGestureListener consumed the event, else false.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Sets the listener which will be called for double-tap and related gestures.
